Plot Method for ConvNMF Objects

Source: R/plot.R
plot.ConvNMF.Rd

Plot Method for ConvNMF Objects

Usage

# S4 method for class 'ConvNMF'
plot(x, spikes = "auto", spike_threshold = 0.95)

Arguments

x

A ConvNMF-class object.

spikes

Mode of spike overlay. Options are "auto" or "none".

spike_threshold

Threshold for spike sorting when spikes = "auto"

Value

A ggplot2 object.
